short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep emails brief with this email-centric word counter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Long emails are no fun to read or write. Brief is a Chrome extension that adds a word counter to the compose and reply views in Gmail and disables sending if an email is longer than 125 words. Need to send an email longer than 125 words? Just triple click the "Send" button to force send!
